titles.title: Law Enforcement Officers' Training Act
To establish a grant program to train law enforcement officers, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 7/12/2001--Introduced. Law Enforcement Officers' Training Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to award not to exceed 100 grants, on a competitive basis, to support seminars and training programs for the professional development of law enforcement officers in the areas of community policing, development of policing skills in a multi-cultural environment, officer survival and defense, the application of technology in law enforcement, supervision and mid-level management skills and techniques, and identification and management of officer fatigue and sleep deprivation.
